title: Rancher Shares Secret to Transforming Land FAST

tasks.task: Changing a pasture's appearance through rotational grazing using polywire.
subtasks: Identify a pasture area for improvement.
Install a strand of polywire fencing around the selected pasture area.
Reorient the cattle's grazing patterns to utilize the new enclosure.
Monitor the pasture's regrowth and adjust polywire placement as needed over 3-5 years.

Identify a pasture area for rotational grazing. Then, you need a plan for what kind of changes you want. But maybe determining the desired landscape isn't a separate task. Maybe combining that with planning the grazing schedule.
